alert.note: Alert for Los Angeles County Mountains excluding the Santa Monica Range (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Watch issued December 28 at 3:08AM PST until December 31 at 4:00AM PST by NWS Oxnard
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WATCH IN EFFECT FROM LATE TONIGHT THROUGH LATE THURSDAY NIGHT... * WHAT...Heavy snow possible. Total snow accumulations of 1 to 3 feet are possible above 5000 feet. Winds could gust as high as 35 to 40 mph. * WHERE...Los Angeles County Mountains excluding the Santa Monica Range. * WHEN...From late tonight through late Thursday night. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult to impossible. Some mountain roadways that could be affected by snowfall include Angeles Crest Highway, Mt. Baldy Road, and Highway 39 in Los Angeles County.
info.instruction: Monitor the latest forecasts for updates on this situation.

area.areaDesc: Los Angeles County Mountains excluding the Santa Monica Range
